thread.title: BRIEF-ICPW Liquidation Corporation Files Joint Plan Of Liquidation

title: BRIEF-ICPW Liquidation Corporation Files Joint Plan Of Liquidation
text:
February 5, 2018 / 3:54 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-ICPW Liquidation Corporation Files Joint Plan Of Liquidation Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - ICPW Liquidation Corp: 
* ICPW LIQUIDATION CORPORATION FILES JOINT PLAN OF LIQUIDATION; SEEKS TRADING HALT 
* ICPW LIQUIDATION CORP SAYS JOINT PLAN OF LIQUIDATION PROVIDES FOR CANCELLATION OF ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES OF COMPANYâ€˜S COMMON STOCK 
* ICPW LIQUIDATION CORP - BANKRUPTCY COURT HAS SCHEDULED A HEARING ON FEBRUARY 12, 2018 TO CONSIDER CONFIRMATION OF JOINT PLAN OF LIQUIDATION 
* ICPW LIQUIDATION - JOINT PLAN OF LIQUIDATION PROVIDES FOR INITIAL ESTIMATED DISTRIBUTION OF ABOUT $0.1128/SHARE TO RECORD HOLDERS AS OF A TO-BE-DETERMINED DATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
